main event: A white circular object was observed hovering over Niagara Falls with no further details available for evaluation, and the object suddenly disappeared.
interesting points: The UFO was initially perceived as a falling leaf before hovering erratically, indicating unusual movement patterns.
The observation was made by 2 civilian witnesses from a distance of 2 miles, providing multiple perspectives on the sighting.
The UFO was approximately 75 seconds in diameter, suggesting a significant size.
There was a brilliant white light at the center of the UFO, with paler blue-green smaller lights around the perimeter, which is an atypical characteristic for known aircraft or natural phenomena.
The report suggests inconclusive conclusions, leaving the nature of the object unidentified.
